title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Total number of homicides, with a total of 6 data points.
Overall Total number of homicides has increased over the Year
Total number of homicides is roughly constant from 2007 to 2011, and lastly slightly increasing from 2011 to 2012.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2011 and 2012.
Max Total number of homicides about 2363.0 was recorded at Year 2012
Min Total number of homicides about 1659.0 was recorded at Year 2008
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Total number of homicides, with a total of 6 data points. The chart has 3 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2009 to 2011.
Conversely, the next significant trend is moderately increasing which exists from 2007 to 2009.
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2011 to 2012.
